overview:
Dustin Rauch is the Founder and President Neighby.

At the age of 12, Dustin started DCR Systems, a successful local computer business that specialized in repair, troubleshooting, creating, and upgrading personal PCs. At the time, the specialized computer services that he offered were hard to find. 10 years later, Dustin’s passion for computers continued, and eventually lead to the creation of Neighby.

Dustin created Neighby because at the time the website was created, there were no other companies that offered the ability to get local information from several online sources in one place. Many sites existed that gave users information about their area, however each had their strengths and weaknesses and none gave the user everything together. Neighby is rapidly becoming a necessary resource to people throughout the country.
